content.body: problem I found with `is` expr. might be visually confusing
content.formatted_body: problem I found with is expr. might be visually confusing

content.body:
```js
if (expr is x[Symbol.toPrimitive]) {}
```

x[Symbol.toPrimitive] or (expr is x)[Symbol.toPrimitive]?

x[Symbol.toPrimitive] or (expr is x)[Symbol.toPrimitive]?

content.body: `x[foo]` is a pattern, the grammar should bind that way. If you want to force the other parsing, `(expr is x)[Symbol.toPrimitive]`.
